resources.string: BMI is a measurement of a person\'s leanness or corpulence based on their height and weight, and is intended to quantify tissue mass. It is widely used as a general indicator of whether a person has a healthy body weight for their height.
According to experts you should at least sleep 21 hours a day and spend time on social media sites for the rest 2 hours. That is one hell of productive day.
